StSpp:XCola.NAME: Coffee
DESCRIPTIONS: X cards no longer consume energy.

StSpp:BoiledEgg.NAME: Cosmic Egg
StSpp:BoiledEgg.FLAVOR: A whole universe in your hand
DESCRIPTIONS: When you draw a card you have #b10% #bof #bchance this card is upgraded for the rest of the fight.

StSpp:BrokenTotem.NAME: Broken Totem
StSpp:BrokenTotem.FLAVOR: Even if the totem is broken some power seems to emanate
DESCRIPTIONS: Curse and status effects are also applied to a random enemy.

StSpp:SailingBoat.NAME: Sailing boat
StSpp:SailingBoat.FLAVOR: It's way heavier than you think
DESCRIPTIONS: At the begin of the #b4th #bturn, gain #b2 #bStrength

StSpp:SailorCap.NAME: Sailor Cap
StSpp:SailorCap.FLAVOR: It's too small for your head
DESCRIPTIONS: At the begin of the #b5th #bturn, draw cards until your hand is full.

StSpp:TwinEgg.NAME: Twin Egg
StSpp:TwinEgg.FLAVOR: Not even born yet and already binded
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play the same card twice, upgrade it until the end of the fight.

StSpp:PetrifiedCaterpillar.NAME: Glass Pickaxe
StSpp:PetrifiedCaterpillar.FLAVOR: It looks like it can break at any moment
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain
#bgolds if you finish a fight #bwithout #blosing #bHP.

StSpp:JackpotMachine.NAME: Light Bulb
DESCRIPTIONS: For every
Card drawn gain [E] .

StSpp:ChessPiece.NAME: Chess piece
StSpp:ChessPiece.FLAVOR: How many games this piece have seen ?
DESCRIPTIONS: the first card you play which contain 'At the next turn' #bcost #b1 #bless and its effect trigger #binstantly.

StSpp:PileOfSugar.NAME: Pile of sugar
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn gain [E] [E] , you lose 30 HP for each unspent [E] at the end of the turn.

StSpp:GiftCard.NAME: Gift card
DESCRIPTIONS: Common cards and potions are free.

StSpp:BackupBattery.NAME: Backup Battery
StSpp:BackupBattery.FLAVOR: Powered on only in the worst situations
DESCRIPTIONS: If you start a turn without channeled orbs , channel two random orbs.

StSpp:SpiranhaBones.NAME: Spirahna Bones
StSpp:SpiranhaBones.FLAVOR: Even if this fish died a long times ago , it seems to be still hungry
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play cards that cost HP, consume block first.

StSpp:CrystalBall.NAME: Crystal Ball
StSpp:CrystalBall.FLAVOR: If you look through this ball you can see all your past and all your potential futures
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon picking, add to your deck all rare cards.

StSpp:WoodenPendulum.NAME: Wooden Pendulum
StSpp:WoodenPendulum.FLAVOR: this perfectly regular and mechanical sound become more and more unbearable
DESCRIPTIONS: If you end a fight in
#bturns or less you have #b2 #bmore #bchoices for card rewards.

StSpp:WoodenStick.NAME: Bow
StSpp:WoodenStick.FLAVOR: A basic weapon , but can become a deadly weapon if well used
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a basic strike or a basic defend ,gain +1 damage / block for the fight.

StSpp:FireArrow.NAME: Torch
StSpp:FireArrow.FLAVOR: It's too hot to keep it in a hand more than a few seconds
DESCRIPTIONS: All your cards in hands are exhausted at the end of the turn.

StSpp:Balance.NAME: Balance
DESCRIPTIONS: Each time you draw a card. Your cheapest card cost 1 more and your most expensive card cost 1 less.

StSpp:Magatama.NAME: Magatama
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn gain [E] , ennemies start with 2 Intangible.

StSpp:Dice.NAME: Dice
DESCRIPTIONS: Morph to a random relic at the begin of each fight.

StSpp:Monolith.NAME: Monolith
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start a of the turn , draw a card as long as you don't play a Power card.
